tool.name: Register Data Folder
tool.command: if [ ! -d $folder -o ! -x $folder ]; then echo $folder does not exist or cannot be accessed > $output exit 1; fi && mkdir output && python -c "import glob; [print(f) for f in glob.glob('$folder/' + ('$filter' or '**'), recursive=True)]" | while IFS= read -r file; do if [ -f \$file ]; then relative_path="\${file#$folder}" && relative_path="\${relative_path#/}" && parent=\${relative_path%/*} && if [ "\$parent" != "\$relative_path" ]; then mkdir -p "output/\$parent"; fi && ln -s "\$file" "output/\$relative_path" && echo registered file "\$file" >> $output; fi; done

param.name: filter
param.label: Filter Files
